# delegate

**Instance Property**

The cloud service view controller’s delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any SKCloudServiceSetupViewControllerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

You can identify a delegate to get informed when the cloud service setup view controller is dismissed.

## Setting a delegate

- **SKCloudServiceSetupViewControllerDelegate**: A protocol that defines the methods a cloud service setup view controller can use to get the status of the view, including when it is dismissed.
